list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: - Completed hashTopic with a somewhat dummy way, of just comparing the distance between the ModKeys of publisher and broker and chosing the closest Broker.

task.summary: -First design of the project. -Dataset inclusion -Directories, packages -system data, instances -Git repo creation, add all above
-Read from files and filtered according to bus lines

-Refactored according to the skeleton. Interfaces, methods, etc... -Proceeded with init publisher. Refactored some code there. -Fixed potential bug with stream and filtering only at busPositions -Added manually file BrokersList.txt with broker info
-Fixed potential bug with stream and filtering everywhere in dataset reading
-Wrote getBrokerList() void function, does the job, but should be moved away from init probably
- Completed hashTopic with a somewhat dummy way, of just comparing the distance between the ModKeys of publisher and broker and chosing the closest Broker.

- Done previous TODO - Populated publisherValues list - Refactored code, deleted Interfaces, created Classes, - Added main method to publisher and broker - First draft of publisher-broker communication

- Created Subscriber communication with Broker. - Publisher after hashTopic also populates responsibilityline list. - Created BrokerInfo class as suggested in the project description. - Lots of refactor to be done, code running but not correctly.
-Removed brokers static list. Now Publisher and Broker has its own brokersCluster list that is (like a configuration)
